content.raw: On branch [introspection_shane](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=introspection&branch=introspection_shane) I changed some copy/pasted code blocks to use the `<include>` tag with a range. I also increased one code block to include the instantiation of `simTime` and `counter` because I didn't realize what they were the first time I read the tutorial. Feel free to merge/discard anything you like/dislike.

I also increased one code block to include the instantiation of simTime and counter because I didn't realize what they were the first time I read the tutorial. Feel free to merge/discard anything you like/dislike.
